sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"弹性的，易弯曲的"之意。
means: flexible ： 主要指有韧性，暗示有可以弯曲而不脆继的特性，但不一定有弹性。也可作引申用。
elastic ： 强调物体的伸展性，也可作引申用。
plastic ： 科技用词，指事物质地柔软，易造型，可塑造成所需的形状。

word_mean: 能屈的：容易弯曲而无折断趋向的

sentence.Network_en: Times become more flexible off-season, especially in the smaller provincial museums.
sentence.Network_cn: 尤其是在规模较小的地方博物馆，开放时间在旅游淡季更加灵活。

sentence.Network_en: Because the work was voluntary it was flexible, time-wise.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项工作是自愿的，所以时间上很灵活。

sentence.Network_en: He shopped around for a firm that would be flexible.
sentence.Network_cn: 他到处寻觅一家可灵活变通的公司。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin flexibilis, from flectere 'to bend'

encyclopedia.content: flexible a. 1. 可弯曲的，易弯曲的；柔韧的；有弹性的 A piece of rubber hose is flexible. 橡皮管可以弯曲。 2. 柔顺的，温顺的 3. 可变通的；灵活的；易适应的 We need a foreign policy that is more flexible. 我们需要更有弹性的外交政策。

entry.def: A flexible object or material can be bent easily without breaking.

entry.tran: 易变通的;适应性强的;灵活的
entry.def: Something or someone that is flexible is able to change easily and adapt to different conditions and circumstances as they occur.

example.ex: Look for software that's flexible enough for a range of abilities.
example.tran: 寻找功能多、适用性强的软件。

means.word_mean: 2. able to flex; able to bend easily;
3. able to adjust readily to different conditions;
4. bending and snapping back readily without breaking
5. making or willing to make concessions;

sentences.sentence: "loneliness tore through him...whenever he thought of...even the compromising Louis du Tillet"

auth_sentence.content: Strong markets and flexible markets is a good combination.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strong markets and flexible markets is a good combination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strong markets and flexible markets is a good combination.

auth_sentence.content: Must be able to work overtime and flexible shifts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Must be able to work overtime and flexible shifts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Must be able to work overtime and flexible shifts.

auth_sentence.content: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strong team spirit, trustworthy, flexible and meticulous.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flex弯曲+ible能……的→adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+flexible[adj.柔韧的,易弯曲的,灵活的,能变形的]→adj.僵硬的,不灵活的;坚定的,固执的
de离开+flex弯曲→离开[偏离]弯曲→偏斜
in向内+flex弯曲→v.弯曲; 内曲

Sentence.sentence: The ones who will do the best in this new environment will be those whose educations have prepared them to be flexible.
Adopt a flexible approach to solving problems

According to Blau and Kahn,Swedish-style paternal(父亲的)leave policies and flexible time arrangements pose a second threat to woman's progress:they make employers cautious about hiring woman for full-time positions at all.

sentences.en: We need a foreign policy that is more flexible.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一种更灵活的外交政策。

jushi.english: We need a more flexible decision-making system.
jushi.chinese: 我们需要一个更灵活的决策体系。
